law.text: Whether a document of title is adequate to fulfill the obligations of a contract for sale, a contract for lease, or the conditions of a letter of credit is determined by Article 2, 2A, or 5 of this chapter.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 38, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 7-509, effective July 1, 1960.
